entry.title: Welcome to My Research Hub
entry.content:
This website serves as my central scientific presence, automatically syncing with GitHub (active projects), ORCID (publications), and other platforms.

What to Expect

This blog will feature:

  • Research updates — Progress on neural-autonomic synchrony and consciousness research
  • Volt engagement — Data analytics and digital policy insights
  • Technical insights — Tools, methods, and open science practices
  • CCC reflections — Digital rights and technological transparency

Philosophy

Everything here operates on principles of open and transparent science. Code, data, and ideas are shared to advance collaborative knowledge.

To add new posts, simply create a markdown file in content/blog/ with this format and commit to GitHub.
